model.view.TempletModel.jsfile:
<script src="../plugins/fckeditor/dialog/common/fck_dialog_common.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">

var dialog	= window.parent ;
var oEditor	= dialog.InnerDialogLoaded() ;

// Gets the document DOM
var oDOM = oEditor.FCK.EditorDocument ;

var oActiveEl = dialog.Selection.GetSelectedElement() ;

function formOnLoad(){
	// First of all, translate the dialog box texts
	oEditor.FCKLanguageManager.TranslatePage(document) ;

	oActiveEl = null ;

	dialog.SetOkButton( true ) ;
	dialog.SetAutoSize( true ) ;
	checkControl();
	//SelectField( 'txtName' ) ;
	window.parent.SetOkButton(true);
	window.focus();
}

function Ok()
{
	oEditor.FCKUndo.SaveUndoStep() ;

	var value = null;
	var selected = document.getElementsByName("$list-selected");
	for (var i=0;i<selected.length;i++) {
		if (selected[i].checked) {
			value = selected[i].value;
			break;
		}
	}
	if (value==null) {
		alert("请选择域！");
		return false;
	}
	var key = value.substring(0,value.indexOf("|"));
	value = value.substring(value.indexOf("|") + 1); 

	oActiveEl = CreateNamedElement( oEditor, oActiveEl, 'INPUT', {name: key,id:key, type: "button", style:"border:0px;color:white;background:blue;"} ) ;

	SetAttribute( oActiveEl, 'value', '[' + value + ']') ;
	SetAttribute( oActiveEl, 'ctrltype', "field" ) ;

	return true ;
}

function checkControl() {
	var c;
	var data;
	var code;
	for (c in gridlist.data) {
		data = gridlist.data[c];
		code = data['name'];

		if (oEditor.FCK.EditorDocument.getElementById(code)) {
			gridlist.deleteRow(c);
		}
	}
}
</script>

<script src="../plugins/fckeditor/dialog/common/fck_dialog_common.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">

var dialog	= window.parent ;
var oEditor	= dialog.InnerDialogLoaded() ;

// Gets the document DOM
var oDOM = oEditor.FCK.EditorDocument ;

var oActiveEl = dialog.Selection.GetSelectedElement() ;

function formOnLoad() {
	// First of all, translate the dialog box texts
	oEditor.FCKLanguageManager.TranslatePage(document) ;

	oActiveEl = null ;

	dialog.SetOkButton( true ) ;
	dialog.SetAutoSize( true ) ;
	//SelectField( 'txtName' ) ;
	checkControl();
	window.parent.SetOkButton(true);
	window.focus();
}


function Ok()
{
	oEditor.FCKUndo.SaveUndoStep() ;

	var value = null;
	var selected = document.getElementsByName("$list-selected");
	for (var i=0;i<selected.length;i++) {
		if (selected[i].checked) {
			value = selected[i].value;
			break;
		}
	}
	if (value==null) {
		alert("请选择域！");
		return false;
	}
	var key = value.substring(0,value.indexOf("|"));
	value = value.substring(value.indexOf("|") + 1); 

	oActiveEl = CreateNamedElement( oEditor, oActiveEl, 'INPUT', {name:"$$" + key,id:"$$" + key, type: "button", style:"border:0px;"} ) ;

	SetAttribute( oActiveEl, 'value', value + ':' ) ;
	SetAttribute( oActiveEl, 'ctrltype', "title" ) ;

	return true ;
}

function checkControl() {
	var c;
	var data;
	var code;
	for (c in gridlist.data) {
		data = gridlist.data[c];
		code = data['name'];
		if (oEditor.FCK.EditorDocument.getElementById("$$" + code)) {
			gridlist.deleteRow(c);
		}
	}
}

</script>
